text: He imanadaragana! Allahara nirdesa man'ya kara, nirdesa man'ya kara rasulera ebam tomadera madhye yara bicaraka tadera. Tarapara yadi tomara kona bisaye bibade prabrtta haye para, tahale ta allaha o tamra rasulera prati pratyarpana kara-yadi tomara allaha o keyamata dibasera upara bisbasi haye thaka. Ara eta'i kalyanakara ebam parinatira dika diye uttama.
